Page0.PageText: Welcome to UniNav - the University Simulator! Press the right arrow key to get started ->

Page1.PageText:
Greetings, Future Scholar! 🎓🌟

Congrats! University here we come! Navigate the ups and downs of college life. Every choice you make shapes your academic journey and personal growth.

Page2.PageText: Freshman, your academic adventure kicks off this week, and the choices you make now will shape your academic year. Ready for the challenges of your very first week? 👀

Page3.PageText: You're in your very first college lecture, a mix of excitement and nervous energy in the air. The professor is discussing a complex topic, and your mind starts to wander. What do you do?

Page4.PageText: Hmmmm, feeling a little lazy? Maybe overwhelmed? That’s totally okay! Go and do something you love and come back. 😉

Page5.PageText: Quizzing the professor, your academic curiosity shines so brightly that it catches your seatmate's attention. Intrigued, they invite you to their club's General Interest Meeting (aka GIM). Ready to dive into new connections? 😌

Page6.PageText: Your TikTok break catches attention, even your professor's (Whoops). On the bright side, a seatmate invites you to their club meeting. Ready for this social twist? 🫢

Page22.PageText: We’re not feeling like meeting new people? That’s okay, but try to get out of your comfort zone and put yourself out there every now and then! For now, does a self-care session sound tempting? 💆‍♀️

Page20.PageText: You find yourself at the General Interest Meeting (GIM) for the "Creative Arts" club. The room is buzzing with artistic energy, and club leaders are presenting various projects. What will you do?

Page21.PageText: Opting to mingle and make new friends, you paint vibrant social connections. Now, as a busy college student juggling classes and club activities, the day is full. After the social buzz, how will you navigate time for assignments? ⏰🎨

Page7.PageText: You have three assignments due in just two days, along with a looming group project submission next week. The workload is intense, and deadlines are closing in. What's your strategy?

Page8.PageText: Opting for prioritization and group collaboration, your strategy is set. Freshman year flew by, and now, the next adventure awaits – time to declare your major! 💁🏽‍♀️

Page9.PageText: You found the details of your required textbook on the course syllabus-yay! Now, this academic plot twist requires swift action. What's your move?

Page10.PageText: You've successfully found the textbook online without denting your wallet—bravo! Freshman year flew by, and now, the next adventure awaits – time to declare your major! 💁🏽‍♀️

Page11.PageText: After a busy day, you find yourself exhausted. Time for a self-care session! What's your go-to move?

Page12.PageText: Stepping outside for a brisk walk, you rejuvenate your mind. College life is becoming familiar, and you crave more. Now, hungry for knowledge, you're eager to delve into on-campus research. How will you navigate this academic pursuit? 👩‍🔬

Page13.PageText: New to the world of research, you feel lost, yet your thirst for knowledge is unyielding. What's your next move?

Page14.PageText: First semester ended sans a research spot; professors missed your capabilities. Next time, show off your relevant skills! So far, it looks like you don’t give yourself enough breaks. Remember to prioritize Health and access campus health services when needed! 🏥

Page25.PageText: Giving up? Not on our watch! You can do it! Maybe you just need a little distraction? How about checking off one more task from your to-do list and filling out your financial forms?

Page15.PageText: The daunting task of deciphering financial aid forms and scholarships is upon you. In the labyrinth of paperwork, you feel lost. How will you navigate this maze?

Page16.PageText: Smart move! Your financial aid advisor assisted with forms and clued you in on continuing student scholarships! Now that you’ve distracted yourself a little bit, don’t forget to get involved in research and gain new experiences! If you’re eager to learn, anything is possible!

Page17.PageText: The major declaration process looms ahead, and the path seems unclear. How will you navigate this academic crossroads?

Page18.PageText: Well done! Website exploration and your advisor's guidance filled in the blanks. Congrats on reaching this milestone! It seems like you’re building a supportive network of people. You might want to check out our suggestions for effective budgeting and time management! You’re killing it!

Page26.PageText: Your success story awaits—thrive, learn, and enjoy the journey! 🚀🎓
